name: College of the Canyons
description:
College of the Canyons is a comprehensive California Community College, serving nearly 25,000 students per year. Academic programs range from Animation to Television, Film and Video Production, from Audio/Radio Production to Video Game Animation, from Biotechnology to Theatre Arts, from Child Development to Paralegal Studies, and from Dance to Industrial Manufacturing. 

The College supports open education in numerous ways. The College hosts an OER repository for educational content produced under a CC-BY license; faculty utilize OER in numerous disciplines, including faculty authored open textbooks in Sociology and Water Technology; College administrators are active in CCCOER and are regular presenters on open education at national conferences.
